full_summary:
# BOLLARD HEAT TRACE MATERIALS TENDER ANNOUNCEMENT
## Tender Details

* **Tender Title:** BOLLARD HEAT TRACE MATERIALS
* **Reference Number:** PW_PP123_43234
* **Amendment Number:** 0
* **Solicitation Number:** EP456-221105/A
* **Publication Date:** August 26, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** September 9, 2022, @ 2:00 PM. 
* **Contracting Entity:** Public Works and Government Services Canada

## Tender Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada invites pre-qualified Suppliers to submit a bid for the supply of bollard heat trace materials as part of the Supply Arrangement (SA) in series E60HN-16ELEC with PSPC.

Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

Required items include:

1. Stainless steel strut, Slotted 1 5/8 inch
2. Breakers Single Pole 15amp 120v GFCI bolt-on
3. Liquid Tight conduit 1 inch
4. 1inch Liquid Tight 90 degree Connector
5. Rigid Couplings 1 inch
6. 1 inch Liquid Tight Connector Straight
7. Strain Relief Plastic Connectors
8. 8x8 Deep PVC Box
9. 1 inch Cobra Straps Stainless Steel
10. 75ft Heat Trace Cable 120v
11. 50ft Heat Trace Cable 120v

Delivery Date: September 30, 2022

Meeting the requirements of the Supply Arrangement (SA) and the policy governing it is necessary, the bid must be submitted in either English or French.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

The bid will be awarded based on the lowest/lower bid.

**Closing Date and Time:** 
The deadline for submitting bids is September 9, 2022, at 2:00 PM.

**Contact Information:**

For any inquiries or concerns, please contact:
Lisa Hampel
Public Works and Government Services Canada
phone:  (613) 294-8381
email: lisa.hampel@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca 
address: 222 Queen Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0S5, Canada

## Instructions for Submissions

The bid documents shall be submitted entirely in either English or French and must be properly endorsed. Furthermore, for any document ascertaining
